reviewText: Bootlegged copy of the Japanese series airing (which explains the censoring).  Has been reported to the actual copyright holders so Amazon should be getting notified to pull this piece of garbage for copyright violation.  Biggest clue that it's bootleg is no region restrictions and 13 episodes on one DVD... not exactly rocket science to figure out that with the high video compression the image is going to be craptacular.
This is the censored version, and the quality of the picture is questionable. This isn't something I wouldn't buy again.
The season is completely censored. If you want the uncensored version do not buy this one.
I enjoyed this anime. The artwork was good enough. The story was ok. I think it could better. It seem to simple. It also as to much stuff between  the episode
I have seen this Amine it is very good  i plan on owning it
